game.name: Creature Kitchen
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Steam Workshop, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A creepy-cozy cooking simulator where you befriend local wildlife and feed them their favorite snacks! With a strange house to search and forest to explore, the witching hour has only begun.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A creepy-cozy cooking simulator where you befriend local wildlife and feed them their favorite snacks! With a strange house to search and forest to explore, the witching hour has only begun.
